testcaseName: Dose # 1 PCV 13 at 12 mo; dose # 2 at 1 yr 8 wks-5 days
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from invalid dose
generalDescription: This test case describes when dose #1 of the Pneumococcal 13 vaccine is administered at 12 months, and the #2 of the Pneumococcal 13 vaccine is administered at 1 yr, 8 weeks - 5 days, that the second dose is not valid.
reasonForChange: V1.2: Condensed the past due date to align with the earliest and recommended date since this child is in catch-up
